triple: a coatrack has a possible state of the cooked state
str: a coatrack has a possible state of the full state, and the full state is the opposite state of the cooked state

triple: a waterglass is used to perform the vacuum action
str: a waterglass can have performed on it the wash action, the wash action can be done with a plate, a plate operates on a bellpepper, and a bellpepper is used to perform the vacuum action
